content.detailedDescription: Yorkville, il hideaway lakes campground. a group of us went on golf carts up church hill path to take pics on digital cams of 'orbs'....(which is known for orb sightings of which i didn't believe and proved me wrong on many occasions...And have brought many people to prove).  this one night upon descent, i was on passenger side and looked (as i always do) towards the stars. i noticed a star moving -- it was moving in a straight line (like taking a point)... two stars moving parallel one from behind thru center to point. yelled to driver of cart to stop.  2 other carts following also stopped...One stuck in mud from a previous rain.  friend took pics on digital phone. who said pics were down loaded to pc at home and claimed to have seen figures when blown up on home pc... never saw...Didn't believe. i saw a program "lights over tinley" on tlc or history channel....And could't believe still.... however... i thought i should share and let ya'll work it through.  i never saw it disappear... just watched in awe and then went back to matters at hand.  hope this info helps.
content.summary: Yorkville,il aug coming from northsky 3objects looked like point moved thru ctr of 2creating tri

content.detailedDescription:
Coming south on hyde road i noticed a very bright light in the sky as i stopped in my vehicle at drew campground. it was not flashing or moving typical to an aircraft (as there were many in the area) object was brighter and more noticeable than anything in the sky at the time. the object suddenly disappeared. it disappeared much like turning a switch on/off. i again, viewed the clear sky to see if it moved or turned and i saw no noticeable proof that it was there anymore.

i see many planes in our area on the approach to hartsfield intl. and we are in a direct path of blackhawk helicopters once or twice a day. this was noticeably brighter than aircraft lights, etc. aircraft lights also do not disappear suddenly. it was also not moving as an aircraft does. it was high enough to not shutter behind trees (i.E. false blinking/behind tree/bridge etc.) and was viewed over the vickery/majors/bigcreek area.
content.summary: Very bright constant light in sky and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Went in my backyard to grab a smoke before going to bed,about 10pm-ish. (just getting into looking up at the sky...Studying/curious)
as i was looking at the night sky, with not much light pollution...I saw what i believed to be a plane. yet it was so far away, more star like of a distance. but i could make out that the lights were moving like it was pivoting. as i looked....All of a sudden, a very bright light hit me. it was like when your eyes get use to the darkness and you can see to walk and not trip...Then someone puts a flashlight in your face. it was that bright. i couldn't see anything around me...Just that light!!!
the craft was right above a tree in my yard as far as the angle looking up. the tree was 10-12 feet tall and i am 5'10.
i couldn't move. i don't know if it was from my curiosity or that i simply was immobile. but within a few seconds it seemed, after the bright white light hit me....The craft was gone. no more "star like" craft in the air. nothing was moving in the sky any longer. i have had quite a few experiences around that time. (before and after)
ords etc.....
i have been to another place/space/planet once before this took place.
i drew a sketch of what i saw when i left my body. what seemed like (at that time) was only a few seconds...Was like hours when it occurred.
content.summary: Saw lights in sky. then was hit with light beam then the object was gone

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my home to place materials in the recycling bin and noticed a cigar shaped object moving slowly from right (south) to left (north). it was mainly noticeable because there was a straight row of evenly spaced red lights running horizontally the length of the craft. it moved slowly, disappeared, and reappeared a couple of times. i tried taking photos with my cell phone but it kept flipping into self portrait mode and i got no shots of the object. from the photos i know the time was 7:06 pm. the object appeared to be about a mile or so from my home, to the east, which is in the direction of the airport. my guess is that it was about 100 feet long. there were four or more lights, all the same color and size. the lights were not very bright. the surface of the object was dark and dull. it was visible for about one minute, half of which time i spent trying to get a photo, the other half watching it. it finally just disappeared from view. it was moving more slowly than an average airplane or helicopter, and disappeared or blinked out a couple of times. because of the shape and multiple red lights, i didn't think it was a conventional aircraft and thought it might be a ufo. i was surprised to see it and my excitement may have played a role in not being able to get a photo. i didn't think much about the event until the next day when i looked at my photos and realized they were either black (no image) or self portraits of my face in the dark with lights reflected on my glasses. the total distance the object traveled was about the width of my fist when held at arm's length. it was just above tree top level from what i could tell.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object with row of red lights along the side moving slowly at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on a river bank when i noticed a light in my peripheral vision the object then flew by me at an estimated speed of 200+ mph as it flew by me i watch it follow the river it then disappeared after turning abruptly around a bank although it glowed brightly it did not illuminate the surrounding area
content.summary: Rectangular with dome on front glowing green with a black trim

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the beautiful night sky with my night vision device when i noticed an object barely visible to my device, then it started to glow like twice its own size but then strangely enough when it was over me at 90 degrees it grew and glowed enormously right at 1:00 min of the video. definitely a ufo. i don't know if the flashing light hit me or not i can't really tell.
content.summary: Ufo glows and sends a big flash at 1:00 min.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son were watching college basketball at 10:53pm when i notice a bright object much lower then the rest of the stars just sitting in one spot i called my son to come take a look at it.I then got my cell phone and started to record the object i called my son to see it also then the thing just started to slowly fly to my right until i could not film any longer. i have at leat 3 videos of it plus one that the video and that image looks like and orb with something inside of it me and my son were amazed at this going on.
content.summary: Watching a basketball game with my 20 year old son i noticed a strange bright  light low in the sky so i got my cell phone and the thing started moveing across the sky we were amazed.I also saw some thing similer a few nights earlier .

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my house in plantation florida and to my far left saw a ery large oval shaped object with lights on it in the sky hovering in what appeared to be a static position. i was going with my mother to pick up prescriptions from walgreens and as we were driving we both looked at it trying to make out what it could be.. it was clearly not a plane or star or any other mundane object. my mom guessed it could be a helicopter but it seemed far to large and the wrong shape to be a helicopter. we looked at it as much as we could during the trip until it was blocked by trees. when we got back to my house it was no longer where i had originally seen it indicating it moved.
content.summary: A large silver "flying saucer" shaped object with lights on both sides that illuminated the whole thing. it hoered and appeared to stay in a similar area the whole time we were driving.

content.detailedDescription: At about 7:10 pm on february 17th 2016 in my apartment faced towards the north side, right in front of taylor creek ravine. my mom witnessed what seemed to be an extremely bright helicopter. it looked very much like a white star, but was pretty far away, and at a high altitude. i ignored it for a second, but then it somehow looked like it changed directions toward my building; it was at an angle downwards. i have an extremely clear window in my 2nd bedroom, so i ran to the bedroom and was absolutely mesmerised. i saw what appeared to be a glowing triangle with three distinct lights - blue, red, and white, flashing periodically, while at an angle ascending upwards very, very slowly, but at the same time very, very fast. i saw it up close, maybe within 400-500 feet. it was so close that i was asking myself: is this real? my mother was right beside me as this event happened to confirm that my eyes were not playing tricks on me. it looked somewhat large, maybe 30 ft. my heart was beating extremely fast - it looked so cool, yet i can say for sure that it was not an airplane, or helicopter. i saw it with perfect visual acuity that it was a defined triangle  with lights. i lost sight of this object when it moved rightwards relative to my window, moving towards the south direction (upwards).
content.summary: An extremely bright looking triangular glowing craft which took an abrupt turn towards our building, slowed down and starting ascending at an angle.

content.detailedDescription: Close to 8 years ago, at night, the moon shined full. i saw the red light on the west above trees maybe 25-28 degrees from horizon, a few moments after it quarter circled me and stopped until north keeping the same distance 500-800feet, approached me until 50-55degs and then left in an angle of nne, like a type of check mark. recourse after 2 minutes in a different angle more to the feeble nne and then disappeared after 3minutes or more, maybe 5mintes. i cannot be sure about it because it was in 2008. it was before 21hours and dark out there, stars in the black sky and for sure it was near an equinox. now it is difficult to say if it quarter circled or the red light that took a course straight from the first moments. how i felt, like normal. there can be lies in there because i did not take notes back then. the speed seem to be constant, no hurry and no sound. but going away to the north it may have picked up some speed because the red light appeared miles away. how i felt after, like nothing happened. i was happy that i finally saw a light in the sky, especially after millions have seen some. later, i just felt like composing a tune on the banjo to remember what i saw.
content.summary: 25 degree red light, quarter circled, approached me , left in an angle, like a check mark.

content.detailedDescription:
We drove from ozark, mo to the mountain grove cemetery to see the grave site of a distant relative who lived in the area. it is a very remote area with fairly separated farmers, on rolling landscape. good for animals, but not flat enough for crops. this makes distance visibility very low. great for hiking and hiding :)

after leaving the cemetery, we were driving back on the dirt roads, and stopped to take pictures on (i believe it was) corey rd. it overlooks a vast valley of trees and rolling hills. my daughter took the first two pictures from the open window in the back seat, then handed me the camera, and i took the last two pictures from the open window of the front seat.

i had no idea what was on the pictures until we got home and i pulled up the pictures and noticed the glowing ball. interesting that on the second picture it is segmented into 4 pie shapes. the first picture also appears to show the ball behind tree limbs.

i am attaching the four consecutive pics so you can see before it came into view and after it went out of view. all pics were taken in less than a minute.
content.summary: I did not know what was on the film until i got home.

after leaving the cemetery, we were driving back on the dirt roads, and stopped to take pictures on (i believe it was) corey rd. it overlooks a vast valley of trees and rolling hills. my daughter took the first two pictures from the open window in the back seat, then handed me the camera, and i took the last two pictures from the open window of the front seat.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the computer late at night and through the window i see a white object moving at approximately 20-40 mph it was pretty strange. at first thought i thought i was just seeing things then i realized i wasn't it was still there. after i realized i wasn't seeing things the object zoomed off at the speed of sound and was quickly out of sight. i didn't think much of it when i first saw it but i have been thinking about it a lot lately
content.summary: White hovering craft

content.detailedDescription: When i looked out the window, i saw what seemed like a bright star, it was changing colors from white to gold to brown. i then took out my iphone 4s and started taking pictures. then i had realized why take pictures record this, so then i hit the record button. while recording it continued to do what it was doing but now it moved and i had lost my focus of it, it appeared it was going east and that was the end of it.
content.summary: I was sick to my stomach went outside to catch a breather, look out the side window on back porch and i something in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was stood at my front door smoking a cigarette  in the middle of the day in dec 2015 when i saw a mirrored sphere moving across the sky, it did not leave a trail like a plane and was not a helicopter it was silent.It was not really fast and made no strange movements but was unlike any craft i have observed before. then approximately 1.5 weeks later i saw another. i wonder about the universe so often just look at the sky and have never seen anything bizarre until now! the first thing i saw was a ball like craft moving across the sky, then i noticed that there was no trail like you get with aeroplanes. i watched it for quite some time until it was out of sight. its motion was very smooth but was powered by something as it was moving across the sky and not up in a vertical manner. i felt calm and was not scared at all, i just watched it until it disappeared. i told my partner after he returned home.He does not believe me.
content.summary: Silver orb

content.detailedDescription:

in addition to the above what i have seen is also submitted for kind information

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were on my front porch which faces out over my elderly neighbors pasture, it was around midnight on 2/17/16 (last night) when we saw a fiery ball of light that was changing from a white to a redish color but not like any plane or lifeflight we've ever seen before, it wasn't a synchronized pattern of light but just changing almost like paint mixing. at first we thought it might have been a firework or one of those birthday lanterns you can light and let off but we realized that's not what it was. it was moving very slow and low to the ground when a second ball of light suddenly appeared and flew with the first one, then the first one just disappeared! we then watched the second one ascend quite fast upwards, then the first one reappeared and joined the second one. they moved together for a few mins before the first one again disappeared while the second one hoovered, we then decided to go inside because it was getting somewhat close and in all honest was freaking us out. we have no idea what this was but it was strange, i wish i'd had a better camera to get it all on video or picture but all i have is an iphone and nothing shows up outside in the dark, not even a ball of light. we would love to find out what it was, i'm not sure if yall can look at records for planes and such that were in the area at the time but we'd love to know. my mother who grew up just a mile or so down the road says this has happened here frequently since she was a kid, she has no explanation for it, i'm not sure if that helps?
thanks
fawn
content.summary: Two balls of firely changing light disappearing, reappearing over treetops.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a storm approaching when i started film it with my smartphone. after a few moments i saw the display a dot moving around, but i found it difficult to spot with the naked eye and turned my attention to the storm. by altitude and speed could not imagine what it could be, i could not really identify it. still no rain in this moment and the wind was moderate. the object left inside a cloud, just before the passage of civil aircraft probably was preparing to land at santos dumont airport in rio de janeiro. the sun was behind this storm cloud. the filming was done pointing to north direction. note the object between 00:51 to 01:05 sec. video made in jacarepagua, west zone of rio de janeiro on 02/17/2016 at around 18: 00hrs, just before the storm that hit the city.
content.summary: Unidentified object in storm over rio de janeiro - brazil
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

content.city: S Hwy I95 bt savanah ga-
content.detailedDescription: My main purpose is to see if anyone else witnessed what i did, if someone could contact and let me know that would be great, also i could fill you in on better details, sorry for the spelling and grammer mistakes in advance..  to start it was between the dates of august 5-10 of 2014 somewhere south bound between savanah ga. and jacksonville fl. on 95 south,  sometime after midnight, no later then 1:30 am ... the whole thing is strange , the sighting and my reaction to it, plus the event's afterwards.  so im driving south bound on 95 there is no traffic from either direction,  and above the hwy is a bright white light, at first thought it might be a helicopter or something,  but quickly realized that is was not, the light was very bright, i turned my radio off, and began to slow down thinking something had to be going on up ahead on the road or air, as i got closer the light just got bigger and brighter, too blinding to make out what it could be, but as i began to drive under the light i could see the underside of a large airplane sized triangle with three neon blue colored donut shaped lights, i was looking up through my windshield of my car while passing under the triangle,  i could see this thing very clearly, it was only right over the hwy, directly ovet my car, but when i was driving towards it before going under it, all i could see was a bright light, never expected to be passing directly under a triangle, well i immediately pulled over and by the time i came to a full stop and looked back and up it was gone,  not a trace, and strangly i just just drove off , i felt very calm, but at the same time something was not right, i felt like i was being watched or followed,  just very strange feelings, and even now after all this time, alot of strange things, ill talk more about that stuff another time, just a lot of unanswered questions, and feelings i cant begin to explain in text, so just have to report this in hopes of answers, and other witnesses. ..   sencerally christopher
content.summary: Was directly under a triangle shaped ufo, with three donuts of blue neon light
content.locationName: S Hwy I95 bt savanah ga- , Florida

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving truck during harvest season of 2011 in farmington washington (state). this sphere appeared one day just outside town above a field. think one of those balls they put on powerlines in some places, but there are no lines up where this was. it must have been a few hundred feet in the air. the sun catching the top of it, shadow on the bottom side. must have stayed there, without swaying like a balloon would, plus no wire, perfectly still. at least an hour went by and it was gone when i glanced over again. i was sitting in a field sitting stable this whole time. the pic i have here is from a few days later when it showed up again. i do not know how to work image software to clean it up, maybe someone could take a look? uploaded image is raw and unaltered from the day i took it.
it appeared to me to be rust reddish in color, i could see some faint detail on the part that was catching the sun, zooming in on this image in windows image viewer shows how the top half is catching sun on the top and shading the bottom.
farmington coordinates: 47°5′26″n 117°2′47″w
content.summary: Red hovering sphere hovering over field in eastern washington

content.detailedDescription: I remember where i was the night we saw the ship ! real big strong looking ship there were lots of light color.Studio city in valley in california the valley that's where we were i lived  i lived in van nuys in the valley he lived in sylmar in california we were at a place called the fox and the hound me and my guy friend peter leblanc we were in studio city
content.summary: I wrote it over 3 times because i made a mistake of the direction and where i was i was in in studio city and it was in the right behind me

content.detailedDescription:
My grandfather and i saw a weird red light moving around in my backyard on 1-14-16 & 1-15-16 decided to get the camera to film it when it started to drop at "free fall". at first i thought it could have been a drone and i know most people will say that but i know it's not. i have also really tired to come up with a logical explanation but i'm 99% sure it's a legitimate unidentified flying object.. i know what drones look like and this moved too quick and too precise to be a drone it had no sway in any direction by wind, the movements were clean. also the red color was so vibrant i have never seen such deep and bright red ever in my life. when i watch the video back i noticed a red dot stationary the whole entire time which i did not see at all when i was filming.. also another very weird incident was the fact that it came back the next night around the same time and has yet to be back since then...
i don't have any good programs or anything to look at it as you do i just want you to have the opportunity to check it out for yourself and see if you can find anything that might be interesting. 
i have alot more information on the subject at hand if you are intrigued please don't hesitant to reply with any questions you are wondering.  
jhonathan211990@yahoo.Com
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red orb moving quick and making odd movements.

content.detailedDescription: I was going across the singing river bridge in florence al around 4:30-4:40 pm. i can see the other side of the river from the bridge and there is a gray, object hovering in the sky along the line of trees. it's probably the size of a small aircraft. it swings from side to side for a few seconds, dips into the trees for maybe 4 seconds and the comes back up to the tree line and darts away toward the south east near the wilson dam. i could not see it anymore after it disappeared around the hills by the dam.
content.summary: Gray football shaped object hovered a few seconds before darting away

content.detailedDescription: I just went into the kitchen to make a drink when i saw this bright object hovering flashing very quickly in an sw direction. it was about 10:30pm. i immediately thought that it was a ufo because there about 2 or 3 us airbases near where i live. the flashes were so fast i couldn't even count how many times per second it flashed-i would say probably about 10-20 flashes per second, something like that. it looked like single dot but when a took a picture of it, it revealed that there were 3 dots in a shape of a triangle. i stood there for about 30 mins and well it just stayed there like it was looking for something. then i left because i got too tired to stay awake that night. the thing is, i don't know what it was looking for but a i feeling it was looking for something. i just couldn't believe what i was seeing.
content.summary: Hovering, flashing very quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the right side so they went towards the right side not the left the dr is on the left they all went to the right they went towards my side when we saw them they were above us we drove straight whatever way we when they were on my side that's the side they disappeared on i'm not a smart girl i don't know - and south and east but i do know i lived in van nuys we were driving towards summa they were on they came from the left but they ended up disappearing in the right side it was my side they disappear. i just think that's something you should let them know things were going deep into the right like right into an angle or could have been right to the side but i'm definitely sure deep to right they were speeding but they all were going in the same direction but angles you know like shooting but all going towards the right right to the left right to the right right to do you know straight down i don't know how to explain that in your little things you want me to pick they didn't make u-turns they this shot from one angle to another okay now you're going to think i'm crazy but it was like from one of those movies like there was a movie with will smith i don't know it its shot across then all of a sudden was going in another direction then another direction was so fast but when it was speeding behind us it seem to be coming out of sky but it seems like it got small as if it was farther away from us then closer to us but yet it seems that in the beginning that it was chasing after us and then changed in size as if it became more distantfrom us then shot another way.
content.summary: It had so many light how no one esle saw it it was big fast could how 10 or more reason i saw front never , diameter

content.detailedDescription: I was out singing karaoke i lived in van nuys at the time so i guess we were at encino as we were getting in the car we noticed this huge thing above us not that close like if you look at the manhattan bridge go above that 3/4/times it seemed that close it was hugelots of lights we became too frightened to notice the color so we got in the car and started to drive to the freeway i looked out the window and it was speeding behind us somewhat distant but coming at us like it was following us i yelled hurry hurry press on the gas then it just shot into another direction and then another one came out of another direction then another one there was at least four to five of them but when we first saw it it was they're above us and then it went into a rocking motion then shut off when i looked out the window it was chasing after a car then all of sudden and when it didn't make a you turn up my. it went into another direction that's when i yelled to my friend peter leblanc from selma cuz we were driving to sylmar he lives there in a guest house at the time i told peter oh my god peter there's more than 4 of 5 bigos one another one another 1 peter bagels 1 another 1 another 1 pizza we started to speed to get away and just as fast as it was chasing behind us it disappeared going we will going straight heading towards sylmar it was behind us they all went towards the left and disappeared now i know how you are ! please don't let the government kill me because i saw thisthis thing could move fast i'm a woman and it was big very big and more then us had to see .How could something that big not be seen. it was kind of square like 7 cars piled up on top each other talk 7 cars going to the left 7 cars going to the right 7 cars going to the left 7 cars going to the right something like that i don't know how to explain it i'm a woman it wasn't something for two people passenger put it that way i think it could have held at least 10 we
